thread.section_title: The Independent Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful hotel
thread.title_full: Wonderful hotel - Review of The Independent Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Nicola B
title: Wonderful hotel
text:
We have just returned from a weekend break in Rome and stayed at The Independent Hotel. The location of the hotel was fantastic and the staff were all very warm and attentive. Our room was lovely and comfortable. Considering the hotel is located next to a busy road we heard no traffic sound.
The roof top bar has stunning views and the staff (who also serve breakfast here) are also so friendly and helpful.
We would fully recommend The Independent Hotel and would definitely stay again with no hesitation.
